title: I think it would be cool if a new champion is given a damage type that deals bonus damage to shields
body:
You have no idea how many times I had to retype that title to get it to fit. Gottem doe.

Anyway, I think that the idea of someone who "breaks enemy lines" or breaks shields or someone's guard would be really cool.

Think of like a poppy/sion type of juggernaut that has an ability (I always imagine it like Olaf's E, for some reason (his E is his true damage))  that deals bonus damage to shields. You could balance it around that the bonus damage only applies to shields, and then it deals other damage or some other subsidiary effect.

Would be really cool way to counterpick champs that just give their ADC a huge shield (Lulu, Janna) apart from giving a champion a kind of Dispel, which would be totally broken in current league.
